sense.def:
A plate
je ploščata okrogla ali ovalna posoda, na katero naložimo hrano.

seg.quote: He looked at the food on his plate.

sense.def:
A plate
je krožnik in njegova vsebina ali samo vsebina na njem.

seg.quote: She pushed her plate of boiled fish away.
He greedily ate up a plate of food that he did not want.

sense.def:
A plate
je tudi ploščat kos kovine, zlasti v strojih in na stavbah.

seg.quote: We got into the cellar through a round hole covered by a metal plate.

sense.def:
Plate
je komplet posod, skled in skodelic iz srebra ali zlata.

seg.quote: We would prefer church plate and other treasures to be stored in bank vaults.

sense.def:
Kadar kovina
is plated
, je prekrita s tankim slojem zlata ali srebra.

A plate in a book
je slika ali fotografija v knjigi; zavzema vso stran.

A dental plate
je oblikovan kos plastike, na katerega so pritrjeni umetni zobje.

To have a lot on one's plate
pomeni imeli veliko dela ali veliko zadev, ki jih moramo rešiti;
